songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Magic, vibrations like magic
Some of us can't handle it
But that don't mean we can't

[Chorus 1]
So paint me in black
Oh, on your cave wall
I wanna know I have your respect
I wanna know I have undivided attention

[Verse 2]
We are stuck in the fake idea
We connect rifles and thought out wars
That's how we get power
It's all force
We all know, we all know

[Chorus 2]
So paint me in ash
On your cave wall
I wanna know you realize your light
I wanna know you observe your life
We all know, we all know
songs.title: Cave Wall
